location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Precis of correspondence on the subject of reception of H.H. the Maharaja of Scindhia [Scindia] at Baroda'

mods.abstract: The précis summarises the visit of the Maharaja of Scindhia (Jayajirao Sindhia) to Baroda to participate in the Baroda Commission and covers the period 9 February - 19 March 1875.The précis refers to the various telegrams and letters sent and received in relation to the Maharaja's visit; the travel arrangements made for him; the programme for his reception at Baroda Railway Station; and the arrangements made for his stay in Baroda for the duration of the Commission.
